title: Google Ads API client
description: Build Python client for Google Ads API: Keyword Planner CPC estimates, campaign creation. See SPIKE-002 research.
close_reason: Implemented Google Ads API client with Keyword Planner, campaign management. 16 tests passing.

title: Product Discovery Service
description: Create service that fetches products from CJ, enriches with Keepa/Google Ads data, and converts to scoring Product model. src/ecom_arb/services/discovery.py

title: Keepa API client
description: Build Python client for Keepa API: product lookup, price history, buy box data. See SPIKE-004 research (Keepa alternative).

title: CJ Dropshipping API client
description: Build Python client for CJ API: auth, product catalog, freight calc, order creation. See SPIKE-003 research.
close_reason: Completed: CJ Dropshipping API client with auth, product queries, freight calc, and order creation. 23 tests passing.

title: Scoring Pipeline Service
description: Create service that takes discovered products, runs them through scorer, and saves to database. src/ecom_arb/services/pipeline.py
close_reason: Implemented scoring pipeline service with ScoredProduct DB model. 11 tests passing.

title: Scored Products API
description: Add API endpoints: GET /products/scored (list scored products), GET /products/{id}/score (get score for product). src/ecom_arb/api/routers/scored.py
